title: LuckPerms如何给予某个世界权限？
author: Super_ZJ
txt_content:
比如给圈地的权限，quandi.use
我只要给世界zc，而其他世界（world）无法使用
请问需要如何写权限点？

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
lp g <用户组> permission set <权限节点> true global <世界名字>
https://github.com/PluginsCDTribe/LuckPerms/wiki/Advanced-Setup
另外参考这篇文档的分世界/服务器权限设置

replies.author: xingzeng
replies.txt_content:
luckperms group default permission set quandi.use zc

如果你的默认组不是 default 请自行替换

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
https://pluginscdtribe.github.io ... /Command-Usage.html
lp user/group <id> permission set <permission> world=<world>复制代码

replies.author: Super_ZJ
replies.txt_content:
xingzeng 发表于 2018-7-18 23:15
luckperms group default permission set quandi.use zc

如果你的默认组不是 default 请自行替换 ...
不好意思，晚来了一步。
